H0.text: Which country will host the 2014 FIFA World Cup. Argentina

H1.text: Which country will host the 2014 FIFA World Cup. South Africa

H2.text: Which country will host the 2014 FIFA World Cup. Spain

H3.text: Which country will host the 2014 FIFA World Cup. Brzil

A4.text: The 2014 FIFA World Cup was held in Brazil.

A5.text: Only Brazil and Colombia formally declared their candidacy but, after the withdrawal of the latter from the process, Brazil was officially elected as host nation unopposed on 30 October 2007.

A6.text: The 2014 FIFA World Cup was hosted by Brazil, the first held in South America since Argentina 1978.
